en.help_help: To see help about any parameter, use 'help param_name'
en.help_twitch_read_firsts: If 'true' takes first message from collected else last.
en.help_twitch_print_messages: Show current message that is voicing.
en.help_twitch_should_filter: Check and replace bad words from messages.
en.help_twitch_censore_by: Choose sign to censore bad words with.
en.help_twitch_remove_censored: If 'true' removes messages with bad words.
en.help_twitch_channel: Specify channel to read chat on.
en.help_twitch_disable: If 'true' no more gets messages from chat, no more voicing them. Doesn't clears already collected messages
en.help_tts_min_pause: After every message read waits for at least specified seconds duration.
en.help_tts_lang: Depending on this you can improve pronunciation of selected language of chat messages, if not matches.
en.help_replace_links_with: Links are now allowed, let's specify which word will be used instead of them.
en.help_skip_answers: Skips messages that have '@username' in them if not it's not channel owner mentioning.
en.help_cli_locale: Based on this you can choose language of console commands and help documents. To get all supported locales use 'cli_locales'
en.help_cli_locales: List supported console languages for commands and help documents.
en.help_ban: Used for banning users by their usernames.
en.help_unban: Used for removing from ban users by their usernames.
en.help_vals: Shows all settings and their values.
en.help_reset: Resets all settings beside channel to read chat on and banned users list

ru.help_help: Чтобы увидеть справку по любому параметру, используйте команду 'справка имя_параметра'
